tickets.description:
Hi, 

I created a group this morning with GroupID fs_721. I also imported 93 members into this group. The problem is I can't find the group anywhere. I suspect I forgot to give it name for when I search for the group it comes up with 1 group found without actually showing the group, Because I was in a hurry I created the same group again (fs_722). Could you please locate and delete group fs_721 for me?

On Mon, Apr 17, 2017 at 2:45 PM, Felicia Gordon <fgordon@rssnyc.org> wrote:

Hi Anthony,

Can you look at something for me?   This is the 2nd time I've noticed that the search directory on our website isn't working. It was supposedly fixed a couple of weeks ago, but clearly wasn't fixed. I would put in a support ticket, but maybe you can do something for me without me having to fill one out. If not, let me know. I'm away right now, on vacation, so if you write back there may be a delay on my end in responding. 

None of my listings are coming up when you click "here."  This is the most important part of the entire website. Without this piece, there's almost no point to our website.  A school just complained to me and I'm upset I'm still dealing with this. This happens when you aren't logged in so if you see the directory, it may be because you're logged in and looking from the back end. Hope this all makes sense. 

https://www.isaagny.org/school-affiliates-directory/searchable-directory

Thanks,
Felicia

tickets.subject: Verifying our website with Youtube
tickets.description:
I need to either upload an HTML file to the root of the website our I need to add the following META tag to the website in order to verify our website with YouTube in order to link videos back to our website with their annotation tools. I tried adding the META code but could figure out how to add the custom name (I could only edit the description & keywords). I have attached the HTML that either needs to go at the root of the site OR here is the code I need to add to the HEAD of the site. Thank again for your help!!!

<meta name="google-site-verification" content="4jLX3HDmtzP_EfeXaIFGx7odBHkOU4XmPI1bDuKh4iI" />

When I checked this page on my home computer twice it showed a https prefix one time https://www.asparis.org/alumni/welcome 
and the second time it showed 
http://www.asparis.org/alumni/welcome 
Please advise, thank you

tickets.subject: Forms Manager Row Export
tickets.description: In the Forms Manager I've been able to make saved views that are useful for different contexts. But in addition to being able to view a custom set of fields, I'd like to be able to export only the specific rows that I select (e.g. only the submissions from the past two days). However, when I select rows that then click "Export," I get all of the submission rows, not just the selected ones. Is there a way to export selected rows only?

tickets.subject: Form Report Export to Excel
tickets.description: I'm having an issue with several form report pages. Specifically, 1847, 1848, 1849 and 1850. When information is entered into the form that these pages report on the email confirmation received displays the correct information. When I view the report results in a web browser the information displayed is correct. If I export to a tab delimited file or simply print the report the information displayed is correct. However, if I export to Excel my CCGA ID field and phone number fields are displaying incorrect information. The numbers do not match what was entered into the form or what is displayed in the browser.

tickets.subject: New website issues
tickets.description:
In addition to the search functionality still broken on mobile (support ticket on that is still open), we have two more issues. 
1. The desktop default or sub nav left banners are showing up on mobile - this is new. They were not on the mobile view before. 
2. When on mobile, on the Contact Us page, the menu is not working. 

Questions- 1. can we control/change what is seen on our social media feed? Ours is located on the home page, and our headmaster wants to be able to choose what is there when it isn't changing *e.g., long weekends like this one. 2. Where do we access Google Analytics? I looked through knowledge base, but that area is usually less than helpful.

Thank  you.
Karen

tickets.subject: Site Not Encrypted
tickets.description:
I know we pay Finalsite every year for SSL certification, but our site is not currently encrypted.  Could this be remedied right away?

I have attached our invoice as well as a screenshot.

tickets.subject: e-notify unsubscribe
tickets.description:
We are getting ready to send a planned giving newsletter via e-notify to a select group of alumni and friends of the school. I've checked "message is a solicitation" option, and was relieved to see that doesn't show up in the test email. But, when I clicked on "unsubscribe" in the test message, the only option is to unsubscribe from all emails, which we don't want them to do - we want them to be able to opt out of the planned giving newsletter, while still continuing to receive other school emails. Is there a way to do this? And can you confirm that the recipients will not see "Message is a solicitation"?

Thanks!

tickets.subject: Creating a way to display athletics scores and records
tickets.raw_subject: Creating a way to display athletics scores and records
tickets.description: I just learned recently that we used to display the team record and scores and results from games and contests on our old website, and in the new format, they are not showing. Do you know if there is something simple we can do to display those again? I know they are being entered into Athletic Manager. I don't know much about that module. Could I get some expertise to help me either: 1) Add those to the settings of an Athletic Event element (not sure any of the calendars I have displaying now are a good place to add them) or 2) Creating a scoreboard area on the main Athletics page, or 3) Another awesome way you recommend.

tickets.subject: Facebook Pixel Code
tickets.description: Greetings, I would like to get some help / make sure of the process for adding some Facebook Pixel code to our site: I think I understand the instructions about how to embed it in a header, but I would clear the code with an expert first - assistance in just embedding it would be great as well. At the same time, I would also like to ask that Steven Katona (katonas@trinityprep.org / katonas - admin) be allowed to be copied on / submit tickets as well. Thanks, Jason Marshall

tickets.subject: Moving tabs
tickets.description: I am unable to move the tabs on this page to put them in the proper order.  they should begin with 2017, 2016, 2015.... etc.  Most recent year should display first.  When I drag and drop they don't go where they should.  Can you please move the 2017 tab to the top?

tickets.subject: Contact Ryan Nolan
tickets.description:
Hi Ryan, I got your message but when I try and call the phone number back, I am getting a "not in service" message. I called 860-360-0166. I tried a few times and listened to the message again. Also, are you emailing me at javensr@countryday.net? I have not seen any emails come through - though they could be going to junk and I am just missing them.
Thanks
Ralph

tickets.subject: Teacher locked out of account
tickets.description: Taylor Ward (tagonzalez) is reporting that she is unable to log in.

satisfaction_rating.comment: Chris is always very easy going and great to work with. Our problem was a challenge but he was persistent and figured it out.

tickets.subject: Reordering pages in Composer
tickets.description: One of our users (serafinel) is trying to reorder some pages under the Academics > Hulbert Taft, Jr. Library section. When I login under my account I have no problem reordering them, but when she logs in she cannot reorder them (her cursor does not turn into the 4-point arrow and instead remains a hand). She's part of the Library Administrators admin group, which I gave full admin rights for this section. Any suggestions as to what might be going on?

tickets.subject: Can you change or set the date of a Groups blog entry?
tickets.raw_subject: Can you change or set the date of a Groups blog entry?
tickets.description:
Occasionally, our faculty post blog entries with typos.  One such entry is linked below.  I'd really like the published date not to change when these are corrected, but there doesn't seem to be another option.  Am I missing something?

If there really isn't a thing to pick the publish date on group blogs, please throw us into the pile of people requesting one from the dev team.  

Thanks, 

Cassie

tickets.subject: exporting list from enotify
tickets.description: We're interested in exporting the names and email addresses of those users who clicked on a particular article we posted in our recenter FieldNotes newsletter. Can you please let us know how to do that? Thank you.

tickets.subject: More problems with blogs on our website
tickets.raw_subject: More problems with blogs on our website
tickets.description:
I've been in touch recently about issues with buttons not working on our blog pages. Post New Topic was not working, and that ticket was resolved. Now, the "Read More" button isn't working. And the Twitter timeline display on two blog pages (www.uaschools.org/superintendent and www.uaschools.org/rdlab) are stretched across the page and the banner that normally displays on the top right of the page is now at the bottom lefthand corner of the page.

Previously, I was told our Twitter timeline was causing the issues but they were resolved. I've attempted to reduce the width of our Twitter timeline on those pages and re-input that HTML, to no effect. 

I yet again have a teacher trying to make her end-of-week post on one of these blogs, so I'd like to get this resolved as soon as possible. Thank you.

tickets.subject: Setting Up Admin Users
tickets.description:
Good afternoon,

I am trying to set up two of our users as admin users. I thought I did this on the back end but they are still not able to access forms, or any other pages that they might need to access.

Francesca Lanning and Kaitlyn Woodward are the two admin that need access to at the very least our forms module.

Can someone please assist?

Thank you,
Arielle

Thank you!

When I receive an eNotify, the sender appears on my phone as whatever I type in "GVS Spring Gala" or "GVS Upper School Office" etc. On a few colleagues' phones, it appears donotreply@greenvale.myenotice.com, which of course we do not want. Is this a setting I can fix on Finalsite, or is this a setting per people's mobile devices? Thank you.

However, if they did have a link somewhere from our old site, I am happy to provide them something similar. Are you able to look at our old website and determine if such a link to this URL existed anywhere? And if so, from where? Thank you! https://theaardvarkdig.com/

tickets.subject: Question regarding forms with recurring payments
tickets.raw_subject: Question regarding forms with recurring payments
tickets.description:
Hi,

We're working on setting up our first for with recurring payments, and had a couple of questions.

1) The payment option seems to work, so long as we put donation amount someplace on the form, is there also a way to put the onetime/recurring on the form as well? With the payments options always coming last, it's awkward to ask for an amount and not specify recurring/one time at the same point.

2) Can we customize the payment page? I thought it was under Site Modules, but I can't find it. We'd like to add some verbiage and a graphic about card types we accept. Our CFO won't accept American Express, which is problematic at times.

3) Does the payment section always have to be the last element?

Thanks

I want this to only be parents of CURRENT STUDENTS (Not parents of future students)

I need to send out more broadcasts this morning so really need some help on this ASAP.

Suzette

tickets.subject: Question - hidden pages
tickets.description: I have a page (home>fine arts>ticket box office) that I have "hidden from navigation elements". Yet a parent searched with the "What are you searching for?" box at the bottom of every web page for "tickets" and found it. While I am glad that the search functionality works, I don't want this page to be found until I finish it and I un-hide it. How do I hide it from being found? I am obviously doing it wrong, should I be doing something else?

tickets.subject: Group Space - Resources External web link
tickets.raw_subject: Group Space - Resources External web link
tickets.description:
Good morning, 

In the folder Health and Sports, under the Resources tab of the group PTA, placed under Public User Groups, it seems like the External web link of the Resource "list of Vets in Lausanne or where you are" is being change on when opened from a smartphone. A parent brought this up to me and I am not sure what phone they are using, but I have tried on my iPhone 7Plus and I have the same result. 

The URL entered on the system is http://yellow.local.ch/q?browse=veterinarian&where=Lausanne but on my phone it becomes i.local.ch/?lang=en#q?q=Lausanne. 
At first, I suspected that the problem was caused by the Local App that was installed on my phone, but the problem persists even after I have uninstalled the app. 

Please let me know if there is anything I should change. Many thanks and I wish you a lovely day, 

Nathalie Meier

tickets.subject: IBSC Annual Conference Registration - Data Updates
tickets.raw_subject: IBSC Annual Conference Registration - Data Updates
tickets.description:
Finalsite Ticket: IBSC Annual Conference Registration
1.	For the data already in the registration database (registration and Attendees), and populated by the Registration Information Form, we have updated the IBSC Member Items field and IBSC Member Alternate Results field with the attached list. 
a.	Please Overwrite the existing data for the Member Form fields (IBSC Member Items field and IBSC Member Alternate Results) with the data in the new list. Note that the item field name will be the same; it is the Alternate Results field that will be updated.
2.	Delegate Christal Boesen
a.	Change delegate type from spouse/partner to regular delegate. 
b.	Update pricing to reflect change (from $450 to $665 (group rate for 4-9 delegates)
3.	For Transaction ID #4532
a.	Change School for all Registration and Attendee Information for IBSC Member fields from University School to Memphis University School. 
i.	Data for this field is to be changed from:
USA-University School (item)  	University School|Shaker Heights|OH|USA|268 (alternate field)
to
USA-Memphis University School (item) 	Memphis University School|Memphis|TN|USA|166 (alternate field)

custom_fields.value: Registration Manager -  2017 IBSC Annual Conference in Baltimore
